title: Beyond the Scenes - How Are Nurses Coping Throughout the Pandemic?
itunes:title: Beyond the Scenes - How Are Nurses Coping Throughout the Pandemic?
description:
Roy Wood Jr. sits down with The Daily Show Associate Producer Madeleine Kuhns and Dr. Christopher Friese to discuss why many nurses are experiencing burnout, how hospitals can help and more.

Watch the original segment: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rP6VjrdSKAQ

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
